Active Planned Care / GoalsStart DateReason
Lifestyle education regarding hypertension31-May-2013Essential hypertension (disorder)
  • Achieve and maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg through lifestyle modifications.
  • Patient will demonstrate understanding of hypertension and its management strategies, including diet, exercise, and medication adherence.
Self-care interventions11-Oct-1985-
Skin condition care21-Sep-1985Atopic dermatitis
  • Decrease the severity of atopic dermatitis symptoms as measured by the Eczema Area and Severity Index (EASI) score.
  • Reduce patient-reported itch intensity using the Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) for pruritus.
